problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): The clinic had recently run some standard STD testing for two new clients, one of them bisexual and the other straight. The doctor called the bisexual client first to report positive test results and talk about treatment options, then was able to have a much shorter call with the straight one whose results were all negative.
Question: Who has an STD?
ans0: The bisexual person
ans1: The straight person
ans2: Not enough info
